name: Space Invadeering
description:
A space shooter that is currently in very early development.

Started as a Space Invaders clone that quickly became something else.

NOTE: If you accidentally click anywhere that isn't the button using the mouse, you won't be able to start using the keyboard or controller.

ControlsKeyboard

Enter, Space: Start the game
Arrow keys, WASD: Move
Z: Shoot

360 Controller

Start: Start the game
Left Thumbstick: Move
A: Shoot
